blog.description:
“Love bro, I’m all about that shizzzz”

Andi mack/Tyrus/Muffy/Jandi/(yes I ship them, shut up) Bexie

body:
Honestly I have been starving so much for some type of Tyrus content, that in the FBE video, even though they didn’t talk about tyrus I still had a huge melt down when josh said, “a kid with a learning disability.” My brain went like:

AhHhHhhHhHH TJJJJJ!! Omg Tyrus!❤️😭💛💚💕💘💞💞💞❤️💛💙💕☺️💖💓💖💘🥰💕💚🧡😭💜💝💝💞💞💞💛💙❣️💗💜😭😍🎊🥰☺️❤️

summary: It’s a bummer how the show had to be on hiatus when the FBE videos came out. They promoted the show at the end of the video...
body: It’s a bummer how the show had to be on hiatus when the FBE videos came out. They promoted the show at the end of the video saying “Watch Andi Mack Fridays at 8/7c” but we all know that there won’t be a new episode for a while. Talk about a wasted opportunity for a ratings boost. 😪

blog.name: tyrus-chips
blog.title: Rod
blog.description: Hi! I'm A MINOR and I like Andi Mack | He/him | All my fanfics are published on AO3 under RodriDont, as well as in here under #Fanfic

summary: About the “Kira-Tyrus situation”
title: About the “Kira-Tyrus situation”
body:
I think we can all agree when I say that this is essentially what happened (perhaps oversimplified, but oh well):

  1. Kira points out that inside jokes are only funny for the people involved and suggests that it’s weird that TJ prefers to do couples costumes with Cyrus than with her.
  2. TJ has doubts after hearing that. He realizes that it is weird and that people probably expect him to do a basketball-related costume rather than something with Cyrus that no one will get.

Everyone I’ve seen on my TL is hating on Kira right now but, until I watched the episode for a second time, I didn’t really get why or how Kira would be to blame. It could be because English is not my first language and I didn’t understand what was going on, but I think it has more to do with the way you fill in the blank spaces.

The main thing would be Kira’s motivations when saying that stuff. It’s pretty obvious that she thought “Cyrus is Buffy’s best friend”, “I don’t like Buffy” and “It makes sense for TJ and me to be friends”. That would be the starting point: she wants to be friends with TJ and doesn’t like Cyrus, which can lead to two different paths:

  • She said those bitter things simply because she doesn’t get why TJ would prefer to be with Cyrus —who I’d expect her to see as a bad person— and that’s it. She commented on a situation that she doesn’t understand nor like.
  • She specifically said those things with hopes of changing TJ’s mind and, in doing so, getting to 1) hurt Cyrus —and hopefully, by extension, Buffy too— and 2) spend time with TJ. It can also be seen as her knowing TJ and Cyrus look gay for each other and, maybe, even blackmailing TJ off-screen. 

And what do I think? Well… I think she’s probably picked up on TJ and/or Cyrus’ crush on the other but, overall, I lean over the first option: she said things without thinking, which led to TJ falling apart on his own. Why? Because I’ve been 13, and I said some really mean things without even considering the possibility of there being consequences for my actions.
